title: PLAZA ORB / hardie volition afterthought
description:
*Why didn't anyone hear the shot?*
On plaza once "convince hardie boys to tell you where ruby is = done" and Klaasje is not arrested and Skillset Compromised is done too.

dialogueTree.title: Volition: "You think you have a pretty hot sus..."
dialogueTree.english: You think you have a pretty hot suspect right now, don't you? That Ruby of yours.
dialogueTree.polish: Myślisz, że masz na celowniku nie lada podejrzaną, nie? Tę swoją Ruby.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Думаеш, што маеш на прыцэле даволі падазроную, ці не так? Сваю Рубі.

links.title: You: "Yeah? And?"
links.english: Yeah? And?
links.polish: Tak. I?
links.belarusian: Так. Я?

links.title: Volition: "Notice how it came together without..."
links.english: Notice how it came together without casting too much suspicion on *Klaasje* -- it was nice and *Ruby-centric* in the end.
links.polish: Spójrz, jak się to poukładało bez zbytniego rzucania podejrzeń na *Klaasje*. Wszystko okazało się na koniec ładnie *Rubycentryczne*.
links.belarusian: Паглядзі, як усё гэта склалася без лішніх падазрэнняў на *Клаасе*. Усё ў рэшце рэшт аказалася прыгожа *Рубіцыянтрычным*.

links.title: You: "What do you mean?"
links.english: What do you mean?
links.polish: Co masz na myśli?
links.belarusian: Што ты маеш на ўвазе?

links.title: Volition: "Anything strike you a bit off about..."
links.english: Anything strike you a bit off about this mish-mash?
links.polish: Nie wydaje ci się, że w tym misz-maszu coś jest nie tak?
links.belarusian: Ці не здаецца табе, што ў гэтым мішаніне нешта не так?

links.title: You: "Well... the bullet didn't have to c..."
links.english: Well... the bullet didn't have to come from the roof, it could have come from anywhere on the coast.
links.polish: No... strzał nie musiał paść z dachu. Kula mogła nadlecieć z dowolnego miejsca na wybrzeżu.
links.belarusian: Не... стрэл не абавязкова павінен быў прагучаць з даху. Куля магла прыляцець з любога месца на ўзбярэжжы.

links.title: Volition: "Absolutely. It could have come from..."
links.english: Absolutely. It could have come from *anywhere*. But you're suddenly so certain it came from the roof behind the window.
links.polish: Zdecydowanie. Mógł paść *skądkolwiek*. Ale nagle jesteś absolutnie pewien, że oddano go z dachu za oknem.
links.belarusian: Безумоўна. Ён мог упасці адкуль заўгодна. Але раптам ты абсалютна ўпэўнены, што ён быў скінуты з даху за вакном.

links.title: You: "The bullet was jacketed -- these do..."
links.english: The bullet was jacketed -- these don't just lie around everywhere, do they...
links.polish: Kula była płaszczowa. A takich nie znajduje się ot tak, co...?
links.belarusian: Кулі былі плашчовыя. А такія не знаходзяцца проста так, ці не...?

links.title: Volition: "Good point. It is rather rare these..."
links.english: Good point. It is rather rare these days... But do continue.
links.polish: Racja. To dzisiaj dość rzadkie... Mów jednak dalej.
links.belarusian: Сапраўды. Гэта сёння даволі рэдка... Але працягвай гаварыць.

links.title: You: "It turned out the bullet was an ant..."
links.english: It turned out the bullet was an antique...
links.polish: Okazało się, że kula była staroświecka...
links.belarusian: Аказалася, што куля была старомодная...

links.title: Volition: "True. Strange how you conducted the..."
links.english: True. Strange how you conducted the whole *advanced ballistics analysis* and then hand-waved it?
links.polish: Prawda. Nie dziwne, że przeprowadziłeś całą tę *zaawansowaną analizę balistyczną*, a potem machnąłeś na to ręką?
links.belarusian: Праўда. Не дзіўна, што ты правёў увесь гэты *прасунуты балістычны аналіз*, а потым махнуў на гэта рукой?

links.title: You: "The footprints in the pinball works..."
links.english: The footprints in the pinball workshop didn't fit with the Odd Sole's prints on the crime scene...
links.polish: Ślady w warsztacie pinballowym nie pasowały do dziwnych odcisków na miejscu zbrodni...
links.belarusian: Сляды ў майстэрні пінболавай машыны не супадалі з дзіўнымі адбіткамі на месцы злачынства...

links.title: Volition: "No, they didn't."
links.english: No, they didn't.
links.polish: Tak. Nie pasowały.
links.belarusian: Так. Не падыходзілі.

links.title: You: "So far no one has mentioned hearing..."
links.english: So far no one has mentioned hearing the shot.
links.polish: Jak dotąd nikt nie wspominał nic o tym, że słyszał strzał.
links.belarusian: Дагэтуль ніхто не згадваў нічога пра тое, што чуў стрэл.

links.title: Volition: "Notice how this hasn't come up at a..."
links.english: Notice how this hasn't come up at all -- even Hardie and his boys didn't mention it. Neither did you.
links.polish: Zwróć uwagę, jak ten wątek został pominięty. Nawet Hardie i jego chłopaki nic o nim nie wspomnieli. Ty też nie.
links.belarusian: Звярніце ўвагу, як гэты тэма была праігнараваная. Нават Хардзі і яго хлопцы нічога пра яе не згадвалі. Вы таксама не.

links.title: You: "Perhaps thinking that Ruby's fondne..."
links.english: Perhaps thinking that Ruby's fondness for girls might drive her to murder was a bit sensationalist.
links.polish: Być może myśl, że upodobanie Ruby do dziewczyn może pchnąć ją do morderstwa, była objawem zbytniej żądzy sensacji.
links.belarusian: Магчыма, думка пра тое, што прыхільнасць Рубі да дзяўчат можа штурхнуць яе да забойства, была сведчаннем празмернай смагі да сенсацый.

links.title: Volition: "No-no, that wasn't sensationalist a..."
links.english: No-no, that wasn't sensationalist at all, that is a *perfectly* valid reason for someone to kill someone.
links.polish: Nie, nie, to nie była żadna żądza sensacji. To *absolutnie* wystarczający powód, żeby ktoś kogoś zabił.
links.belarusian: Не, не, гэта не было аніякае жаданне сенсацый. Гэта *абсалютна* дастатковая прычына, каб нехта каго-небудзь забіў.

links.title: Suggestion: "See, even he acknowledges that it's..."
links.english: See, even he acknowledges that it's a good reason!
links.polish: Widzisz? Też uważa, że to dobry pomysł!
links.belarusian: Бачыш? Ён таксама лічыць, што гэта добрая ідэя!

links.title: Volition: "Man, really? You're, like... just t..."
links.english: Man, really? You're, like... just the most compromised of them all. Man, maybe you should just fire this one, it's completely useless.
links.polish: Ty tak poważnie? Jesteś przecież... najbardziej nieudaną częścią z nas wszystkich. Chyba lepiej by tu było kogoś zwolnić, chłopie. Kompletna bezużyteczność.
links.belarusian: Ты так сур'ёзна? Ты ж... самая няўдалая частка з нас усіх. Мабыць, лепш было б каго-небудзь звольніць, дзядзька. Поўная бескарыснасць.

links.title: You: "I don't know, my roof route theory..."
links.english: I don't know, my roof route theory was solid.
links.polish: No nie wiem, moja teoria z przejściem na dach była całkiem rozsądna.
links.belarusian: Ну не ведаю, мая тэорыя з пераходам на дах была цалкам разумная.

links.title: Volition: "Yeah, the route was pretty solid. G..."
links.english: Yeah, the route was pretty solid. Good work there. Still...
links.polish: Tak, to przejście było rozsądne. Dobra robota. A jednak...
links.belarusian: Так, гэты пераход быў разумны. Добрая работа. Аднак...

links.title: You: "I'm done thinking about this. [Fini..."
links.english: I'm done thinking about this. [Finish thought.]
links.polish: Czas zakończyć te rozmyślania. [Zakończ myśl].
links.belarusian: Час скончыць гэтыя роздумы. [Скончы думку].

links.title: Volition: "That's right. *Finish thought*. Jus..."
links.english: That's right. *Finish thought*. Just finish it and conveniently go on. She's watching you leave right now, you know that? Free as a bird on that roof. Lighting up a cigarette and thinking: am I glad Ruby's in this shit and not me!
links.polish: Właśnie tak. *Zakończ myśl*. Urwij ją sobie wygodnie i idź dalej. Wiesz, że ona patrzy właśnie, jak odchodzisz? Wolna jak ptak na tym dachu. Zapala papierosa i myśli – jak dobrze, że to Ruby siedzi w tym syfie, a nie ja!
links.belarusian: Вось так. *Скончы думку*. Парві яе зручна і ідзі далей. Ты ведаеш, што яна глядзіць менавіта, як ты адыходзіш? Свабодная як птушка на гэтым даху. Запальвае цыгарэту і думае — як добра, што гэта Рубі сядзіць у гэтым хламе, а не я!

links.title: Logic: "Don't listen to this guy. The theor..."
links.english: Don't listen to this guy. The theory was solid. He's just jealous. Move on, it's no use harassing her further.
links.polish: Nie słuchaj tego. To była porządna hipoteza. Jest po prostu zazdrosny. Daj już spokój, nie ma sensu dłużej nękać kobiety.
links.belarusian: Не слухай гэтага. Гэта была прыстойная гіпотэза. Ён проста зайздросціць. Хопіць ужо, няма сэнсу далей турбаваць жанчыну.

links.title: You: "I don't need this criticism right n..."
links.english: I don't need this criticism right now, this chapter is closed. [Discard thought.]
links.polish: Niepotrzebna mi teraz krytyka. Ten rozdział jest zamknięty. [Odrzuć myśl].
links.belarusian: Мне цяпер не патрэбна крытыка. Гэты раздзел закрыты. [Адхілі думку].
